channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Team – WordPress Team Members Showcase Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Team – WordPress Team Members Showcase Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-2557|2024-08-03T00:39:08.000Z -- unknown -- team%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20team%20members%20showcase%20plugin
item.description: The Team WordPress plugin before 4.1.2 contains a file which could allow any authenticated users to download arbitrary files from the server via a path traversal vector. Furthermore, the file will also be deleted after its content is returned to the user
